RAD_DATASOURCES.DEFAULT_WHERE: OLTBS_CONTRACT_CHANGE_LOG.EVENT_SEQ_NO <= OLTBS_CONTRACT_EVENT_LOG.EVENT_SEQ_NO AND OLTBS_CONTRACT_CHANGE_LOG.EVENT_SEQ_NO > (SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_SEQ_NO),0) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_EVENT_LOG WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = OLTBS_CONTRACT.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND AUTH_STATUS = 'A')
OLTBS_CONTRACT_OVD.EVENT_SEQ_NO >= (SELECT NVL(MAX(EVENT_SEQ_NO),0) FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_EVENT_LOG WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = OLTBS_CONTRACT.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND AUTH_STATUS = 'A')

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO,B.EVENT_CODE,B.EVENT_SEQ_NO,B.MAKER_ID,B.MAKER_DT_STAMP FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_RESERVE A,OLTBS_CONTRACT_EVENT_LOG B WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND B.EVENT_CODE IN ('LBVAMND') AND B.AUTH_STATUS = 'U' ORDER BY EVENT_SEQ_NO
